name: Fidget Trading 3D - Fidget Toys
description:
Want to collect ALL The Fidgets In The World? Then, Fidget Trading 3D is just for you!

Pop-Its★ Infinity Cubes★ Fidget Spinners★ Squishies★ Tangles★ Boinks and much more…

Trade unique fidgets, Master reading the psychology of your opponent, Develop you trading techniques, Use infamous scam tactics or trade with honour! It all depends on your playstyle.

Make profitable trades and become an expert of Fidget Toys. Play with hundreds of fidgets. Are you ready to become the most relaxed fidget billionaire in the world?

▸Features:
-200+ Unique fidget toys to collect
-Interact with fidget toys you own!
-Different minigames to try out in “level mode”

Fidgets are so relaxing and cool, they pack endless amount of fun just like Fidget Trading 3D!

How many fidgets can you collect?
